project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of design and construction of water supply and sewerage facilities including surface intakes, wells, treatment plants, pumping stations, transmission lines, distribution networks and metered house connections in various cities and town of Minas Gerais; the development of norms, policies and educational programs for implementation of sanitation systems in small communities; and a study of sewerage charges for Minas Gerais.
